INSERT INTO `#__rsform_properties` (`PropertyId`,`ComponentId`,`PropertyName`,`PropertyValue`) VALUES ('','{ComponentId}','ITEMS','Component Method 
Cash Flow Method
Threshold Method
Provide all Three Methods
Vendor to Define Reserve Study Method.' )

INSERT INTO `#__rsform_properties` (`PropertyId`,`ComponentId`,`PropertyName`,`PropertyValue`) VALUES ('','{ComponentId}','DESCRIPTION','

Reserve Type Method Options:


Cash Flow Method: Reserve funding plan where contributions to the reserve fund are designed to offset the variable annual expenditures from the reserve fund. Funding plans are tested against the anticipated schedule of reserve expenses until the desired funding goal is achieved.

Component Method: Reserve funding plan where the total contribution is based on the sum of contributions for individual components.

Threshold Method: Reserve funding plan that sets a buffer dollar amount in combination with the Cash Flow Method baseline cash balance.

' )

INSERT INTO `#__rsform_properties` (`PropertyId`,`ComponentId`,`PropertyName`,`PropertyValue`) VALUES ('','{ComponentId}','ITEMS','Full - Reserve vendor does a component inventory, a condition assessment (based upon on-site visual observations), and life and valuation estimates to determine both a fund status and a funding plan.\r\nUpdate, With-Site-Visit/On-Site Review - Reserve vendor does a component inventory (verification only, no measurements), a condition assessment (based on on-site visual observations), and life and valuation estimates to determine both a fund status and a funding plan.\r\nUpdate, No-Site-Visit/Off Site Review - Reserve vendor conducts life and valuation estimates to determine a fund status and a funding plan.' )

INSERT INTO `#__rsform_properties` (`PropertyId`,`ComponentId`,`PropertyName`,`PropertyValue`) VALUES ('','{ComponentId}','ITEMS','CAI Reserve Specialist Designation\r\nAPRA Professional Reserve Analst Designation' )

INSERT INTO `#__rsform_properties` (`PropertyId`,`ComponentId`,`PropertyName`,`PropertyValue`) VALUES ('','{ComponentId}','TEXT','Unless otherwise specifically agreed, the information provided is to assist in developing the scope of the reserve study and is not to be relied upon as complete or taken as inclusive of all elements required for the completed study. It is incumbent upon the provider of this service to provide complete scope as an element of the service provided.' )
